# NSScroller.KnobStyle.light

**Case**

Specifies a light knob.

## Declaration

```swift
case light
```

## Discussion

This style is particularly good against a dark background.

## Constants

- **NSScroller.KnobStyle.default**: Specifies a dark knob with a light border.
- **NSScroller.KnobStyle.dark**: Specifies a dark knob.

items.description: Specifies a dark knob with a light border.
items.name: NSScroller.KnobStyle.default
